tasks.title: Rich UI Components in Chat
tasks.description: Implement a rich component system that allows for interactive status cards, real-time metric visualizations, interactive code diff viewers, collapsible sections, embedded terminal sessions, and progress indicators.
tasks.context: Current chat interface is primarily text-based with limited ability to render rich content.
tasks.problem: Complex data like CI/CD status, system metrics, or visual debugging information can't be effectively displayed in an interactive way.
tasks.solution: Implement rich component system with interactive elements and visualization tools.

tasks.title: Multi-Backend Routing
tasks.description: Create an intelligent backend routing layer that supports multiple AI backends and routes queries based on content type, complexity, or user preference.
tasks.context: System currently primarily supports a single AI backend (Qwen), limiting flexibility.
tasks.problem: Users have limited flexibility to switch between different AI backends based on specific needs.
tasks.solution: Create intelligent routing layer supporting multiple backends with optimization strategies.

tasks.title: Conversation Templates
tasks.description: Implement a template system for pre-defined conversation starters with variables, customization, and sharing capabilities.
tasks.context: Users frequently start conversations with similar patterns for routine tasks.
tasks.problem: Users must repeatedly construct similar prompts for routine tasks, leading to inefficiency.
tasks.solution: Create template system with variables, customization, and organizational features.

tasks.title: Enhanced Error Surfacing for Long-Running Streams
tasks.description: Implement improved error handling with summary indicators, visual highlighting, error channels, and recovery suggestions.
tasks.context: Long-running operations generate streaming output where errors can be missed in the flow.
tasks.problem: Errors and warnings in long-running streams can be buried and missed by users.
tasks.solution: Provide enhanced error visibility with summaries, highlighting, and recovery mechanisms.

tasks.title: Context-Aware Command Suggestions
tasks.description: Create an intelligent suggestion system that analyzes project state and recent operations to suggest relevant commands.
tasks.context: Users perform sequences of related commands but must remember appropriate next steps.
tasks.problem: Users must manually remember what commands to run next, leading to inefficiency.
tasks.solution: Provide intelligent, context-aware command suggestions and quick actions.
